text: Angel Faus Belau (9 February 1936 - 30 August 2020) was a Spanish journalist and educator. He was born in Villarreal, Province of Castellón. He was a communications professor at the University of Navarra. He was a well known expert of European radio communication. He was a member of the Academia Española de la Radio. Faus Belau died on 30 August 2020 in Castellón de la Plana at the age of 84.Muere Ángel Faus, el primer doctor en Información en España ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish journalists Category:Spanish academics
title: Ángel Faus Belau
